SEARCH
Package Services

Class Service

java.lang.Object
Services.Service
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClearDBService, CreateGameService, JoinGameService, ListGamesService, LoginService, LogoutService, RegisterService
public class Service extends Object
This class represents a service. It provides a constructor and getters and setters for the DAOs.
